title: Stats don’t tell the story of Drake Maye’s improbable run to Super Bowl LX
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "I just know that I can count on 10.
When in doubt, count on 10.
" Drake Maye and the Patriots are going to Super Bowl LX.

title: 5 things to know about Patriots Super Bowl LX foe Seahawks
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots The Seahawks boast the third-ranked offense in points per game and limited opponents to a league-best 17.
2 points per game.
Sam Darnold and the Seahawks will take on the Patriots in Super Bowl LX.

title: ‘It’s a new era’: Drake Maye and Mike Vrabel will write New England’s next Super Bowl chapter
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots Tom Brady and Brady Belichick have moved on.
Maye and Vrabel have shown that the future is here.
Mike Vrabel and Drake Maye AP Photo/Ashley Landis Drake Maye bumped heads with Will Campbell after lining up in victory formation to close out the Patriots’ 10-7 win in the AFC title game.

title: An emotional Stefon Diggs finally earns his shot at a Super Bowl title
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "New team, new situation, new coaches, new teammates.
It all happened exactly how it was supposed to.
" Stefon Diggs is going to Super Bowl for the first time in his career.

title: Patriots embrace ‘road warrior’ mindset in blizzard conditions at Denver
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "You get between them lines, then we see what's going to happen.
So cut the tape and see what happened today.
" Christian Gonzalez and the Patriots defense limited the Broncos to just seven points on Sunday.
